column3: name
CIS - Ensure All Apple-provided Software Is Current (Fleetd Required)
CIS - Ensure Download New Updates When Available Is Enabled (MDM Required)

CIS - Ensure XProtect Is Running and Updated

CIS - Ensure iCloud Drive storage solution is disabled (MDM Required)
CIS - Ensure iCloud Drive storage solution is enabled (MDM Required)

CIS - Ensure iCloud Keychain is enabled (if your org policy is to enable it) (MDM Required)
CIS - Ensure iCloud Drive Document and Desktop Sync Is Disabled (MDM Required)
CIS - Ensure Firewall Is Enabled
CIS - Ensure Firewall Stealth Mode Is Enabled

CIS - Ensure Siri field TypeToSiriEnabled is false (Based on organization's policy)

CIS - Ensure Siri field StatusMenuVisible is false (Based on organization's policy)

CIS - Ensure Siri field VoiceTriggerUserEnabled is false (Based on organization's policy)

CIS - Ensure Siri field LockscreenEnabled is false (Based on organization's policy)

CIS - Ensure Location Services Is Enabled for a specific list of applications (Based on organization's policy)

"CIS - Ensure the OS is not Activate When Resuming from Sleep (Fleetd
CIS - Ensure a Password is Required to Wake the Computer From Sleep or Screen Saver Is Enabled (MDM Required)

CIS - Ensure HTTP Server Is Disabled
CIS - Ensure NFS Server Is Disabled
